DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion : age 16 70 year ; body mass index 1825 kg/m2 ; physical status classify ASA class I II ; schedule elective craniotomy Any patient would exclude study patient complicate serious coagulopathy , hepatorenal insufficiency , aortic regurgitation , cardiac arrhythmia ; previous history intraaortic balloon counterpulsation ; exhibit systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) ≥160 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) ≥100 mmHg , heart rate ≥ 100 bpm operating room admission ; reject participate study .
